name: MyCloudHome
0:
”Alexa, ask My Cloud to play music”
”Alexa, ask My Cloud to play the song THRILLER”
”Alexa, ask My Cloud to play music by MICHAEL JACKSON”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my cloud
des:
Now in Public Beta for US Only (works only with My Cloud Home)

Your My Cloud Home skill for Amazon Alexa connects you to your music collection on your My Cloud Home. Use your voice to play a specific song, songs by artist and more. Enjoy hands-free control.

To get started, you will require a My Cloud Home device, a My Cloud Home account, and music saved on the device in order for this skill to work. Just enable the skill, and log in to your My Cloud Home account, and you are ready to use your My Cloud Home with Alexa.

Check out more details about My Cloud Home here - https://www.wdc.com/products/personal-cloud-storage/my-cloud-home.html

Try these phrases:
Alexa, ask My Cloud to get my device’s info 
Alexa, ask My Cloud to play music
Alexa, ask My Cloud to play music from the folder {Folder}
Alexa, ask My Cloud to play music in album {Album}
Alexa, ask My Cloud to play the song {Song}
Alexa, ask My Cloud to play {Genre} music
Alexa, ask My Cloud to play music by {Artist}
Alexa, ask My Cloud what's playing right now

For additional information, support, or help linking your accounts together, or available commands, visit https://support.wdc.com/ and search for Alexa.

Open source Licenses - http://apppartners.mycloud.com/alexa/LICENSE/alexa-mycloudhome-licenses.txt

Based on your feedback, we will be improving this skill throughout Beta.
